DataSourcePortable.Name: CRMCHART2
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(A.HANDLE) QTDE,B.NOME AS FASE,
CASE
 WHEN B.HANDLE = 1 THEN '#9B59B6'
 WHEN B.HANDLE = 2 THEN '#f2784b'
 WHEN B.HANDLE = 3 THEN '#578ebe'
 WHEN B.HANDLE = 4 THEN '#e35b5a'
 WHEN B.HANDLE = 5 THEN '#44b6ae'
END AS COLOR
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_FASES B ON B.HANDLE = A.FASE
GROUP BY B.HANDLE, B.NOME" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> <Field Alias="FASE" From="A" Path="FASE" /> <Field Alias="COLOR" From="A" Path="COLOR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
